description:
Looking for quality, durable commercial dining chairs? We have selected a range of exceptional quality, value for money dining chairs ideal for any venue. Our dining chair selection includes various upholstered chairs, wood finishes and frame colours to complement your interiors. Talk to our sales team about upholstering our chairs in custom fabric, fauxs or leathers. We offer chairs with:
  • wooden frames with upholstered seat & backrests,
  • wooden frames with wooden seat & backrests,
  • metal frames with upholstered seat & backrests,
  • metal frames with polypropylene or wooden seat & backrests,
  • polypropylene chairs,
  • rattan chairs,
  • metal chairs and
  • office chairs.
All items which contain foam and/or fabric are CRIB 5 Certified unless otherwise stated.
name: Dining Chairs
